purpose: Identify and categorize BES Cyber Systems and their associated BES Cyber Assets for the application of cyber security requirements commensurate with the adverse impact that loss compromise or misuse of those BES Cyber Systems could have on the reliable operation of the BES
scope: BES Cyber Systems categorization by impact level
applicability: All Responsible Entities that own or operate Bulk Electric System assets

purpose: Specify consistent and sustainable security management controls that establish responsibility and accountability to protect BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES
applicability: All Responsible Entities with identified BES Cyber Systems

purpose: Minimize the risk posed to Responsible Entities from individuals accessing BES Cyber Systems by requiring an appropriate level of personnel risk assessment training and security awareness
applicability: Entities with Medium and High Impact BES Cyber Systems

purpose: Manage electronic access to BES Cyber Systems by specifying a controlled Electronic Security Perimeter in order to protect BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES
applicability: High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems

standard_name: Physical Security of BES Cyber Systems
purpose: Manage physical access to BES Cyber Systems by specifying a physical security plan in support of protecting BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES
applicability: High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems and facilities

purpose: Manage system security by specifying select technical operational and procedural requirements in order to support protecting BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES
applicability: High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems

purpose: Mitigate the risk to the reliable operation of the BES as the result of a Cybersecurity Incident by specifying incident response requirements
applicability: High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems

standard_name: Recovery Plans for BES Cyber Systems
purpose: Recovery reliability functions performed by BES Cyber Systems by specifying recovery plan requirements in support of continued stability operability and reliability of the BES
applicability: High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems

standard_name: Configuration Change Management and Vulnerability Assessments
purpose: Prevent and detect unauthorized changes to BES Cyber Systems by specifying configuration change management and vulnerability assessment requirements in order to protect BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES
applicability: High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems

purpose: Prevent unauthorized access to BES Cyber System Information (BCSI) by specifying information protection requirements in support of protecting BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability in the BES
Protect the confidentiality and integrity of real-time assessment and real-time monitoring data while being transmitted between Control Centers
applicability: Reliability Coordinators Balancing Authorities Transmission Operators

purpose: Mitigate cybersecurity risks to the reliable operation of the BES by implementing security controls for supply chain risk management of BES Cyber Systems
applicability: Entities procuring BES Cyber System hardware software services

purpose: Identify and protect Transmission stations and Transmission substations and their associated primary control centers that if rendered inoperable or damaged as a result of physical attack could result in instability uncontrolled separation or Cascading within an Interconnection
applicability: Transmission Owners operating at 765kV or above or critical facilities

purpose: Detect anomalous or unauthorized network activity within Electronic Security Perimeters containing high and medium impact BES Cyber Systems through Internal Network Security Monitoring (INSM)
scope: Internal network threat detection and monitoring
applicability: High Impact BCS and Medium Impact BCS with External Routable Connectivity

purpose: Communicate to appropriate parties information related to potential physical threats sabotage or suspicious activities to facilitate identification investigation and appropriate responses
